Trial_huaban.Description: Beat Sasa to the finishing line, within time limit.

missionline.Description: Reach the finishing line within time limit without touching the rays

DrillingCircle01_A1.Description: Goal: Touch the red light to get training points.
DrillingCircle01_A1.IntroduceContent:
1. The cannon launched by the training facility projection can launch you into the air.
2. Go through the blue power ring in the air to gain momentum.
3. Touch the red balls of light to gain points, which will be converted to proficiency at the end.

DrillingCircle02_A1.Description: Goal: Touch the red light to get training points.
DrillingCircle02_A1.IntroduceContent:
1. The cannon launched by the training facility projection can launch you into the air.
2. Go through the blue power ring in the air to gain momentum.
3. Touch the red balls of light to gain points, which will be converted to proficiency at the end.

DrillingCircle02_A2.Description: Goal: Touch 5 red balls of light.
DrillingCircle02_A2.IntroduceContent:
Conquering the sky is everyone's dream. Complete a variety of flight training to show your own style of mastering the sky.

Challenge Difficulty: Normal
1. Touch the balls of red light to gain points. These points will be converted into more rewards at the end.
2. Go through the blue power ring in the air to gain momentum.

DrillingCircle01_A2.Description: Goal: Touch 5 red balls of light.
DrillingCircle01_A2.IntroduceContent:
Conquering the sky is everyone's dream. Complete a variety of flight training to show your own style of mastering the sky.

Challenge Difficulty: Hard   *Mighty Mushrooms can make this challenge easier.
1. Touch the balls of red light to gain points. These points will be converted into more rewards at the end.
2. Go through the blue power ring in the air to gain momentum.
3. Going through the green power ring can restore endurance.

WAM02_A1.IntroduceContent:
A game beloved by children, especially for its use of the popular mechanic otter. Use the weapon in your hands to gain more points.

Challenge Difficulty: Easy
1. The platform projected by the training facility will periodically spawn projected creatures.
2. Use your weapon to eliminate the blue projected otter to gain more points.

WAM01_A1.IntroduceContent:
A game beloved by children, especially for its use of the popular mechanic otter. Use the weapon in your hands to gain more points.

Challenge Difficulty: Normal
1. The platform projected by the training facility will periodically spawn projected creatures.
2. Use your weapon to eliminate the blue projected otter to gain more points.
*If you eliminated the red otter, a certain amount of points will be deducted.

LevitatedBall01_A1.Description: Goal: Touch 5 gold balls of light.
LevitatedBall01_A1.IntroduceContent:
Flying Speedy is the most popular arcade game on Astra. Every day, all kinds of game fanatics discuss how to complete the challenge faster and better.

Challenge Difficulty: Normal
1. Control Flying Speedy to steer away from the red ball of light to avoid failing the challenge.
2. Touch the golden ball of light to earn training points.
3. Points are converted into rewards after training is completed.

LevitatedBall01_A2.Description: Goal: Touch 5 gold balls of light.
LevitatedBall01_A2.IntroduceContent:

2. Touch the golden ball of light to earn training points.
3. Points are converted into rewards after training is completed.

PullBall01_A1.Description: Goal: Roll 2 energy orbs into the goal
PullBall01_A1.IntroduceContent:
Energy Orb seems to be a pure luck game, but it is actually very skillful. Everyone is challenged to discover the right angle to push at, but the most exciting moment is when the orb scores.

Challenge Difficulty: Hard
1. Push the energy orb to roll it down the slope.
2. Training points are awarded when the energy orb enters the goal beneath the slope.
3. Points are converted into rewards at the end of the training.

TurnOverCard01_A1.Description: Goal: Flip the cards and get a match
TurnOverCard01_A1.IntroduceContent:
Card flip training is a great way to train your memory, especially the Card Flip Series 3.0 launched by Banges, which guarantees updates and improves your experience.

Challenge Difficulty: Easy
1. Tap on a card to flip it. Up to two cards can be flipped at the same time.
2. You will earn points if the two cards match. Otherwise, they will back over.
3. Points are converted into rewards after the training is completed.

KeepForward01_A1.Description: Goal: Control the small droid to walk, and pass the grid to get points.
KeepForward01_A1.IntroduceContent:
The small Banges handling droid can effectively improve work efficiency, but you need to plan its walking route in advance for each handling.

Challenge Difficulty: Easy
1. Control the small droid and move to the destination to complete the training.
2. The longer the route, the higher the points. Obtain the key to get extra points.
3. The small droid cannot pass through points it has already passed.

KeepForward04_A4.Description: Goal: Control the small droid to walk, and pass the grid to get points.
KeepForward04_A4.IntroduceContent:
The small Banges handling droid can effectively improve work efficiency, but you need to plan its walking route in advance for each handling.

Challenge Difficulty: Normal
1. Control the small droid and move to the destination to complete the training.
2. The longer the route, the higher the points. Obtain the key to get extra points.
3. The small droid cannot pass through points it has already passed.

MathRun.Description: Push the joystick forward to speed up. Dash towards the destination!

questboom_2.Description: Freeze the green pipe with the coolant launcher. The mission fails if you touch the red pipe.

questboom_3.Description: Freeze the green pipe with the coolant launcher. The mission fails if you touch the red pipe.

questboom_4.Description: Freeze the green pipe with the coolant launcher. The mission fails if you touch the red pipe.

TimeLimitKill01_A1.IntroduceContent:
In order to collect various combat data, variety of combat challenges will be in the way, and many former enemies will be reproduced in the projections.

Challenge Difficulty: Normal
1. Defeat the projected enemies within the time limit to complete the challenge.

TimeLimitKill02_A1.IntroduceContent:
In order to collect various cambatants' combat data, everywhere has a variety of combat challenges, and many former enemies will be reproduced in the projections.

Challenge Difficulty: Hard
1. Defeat the projected enemies within the time limit to complete the challenge.
*Extremely dangerous. Please improve your ability.

TimeDestination01_A1.Description: Goal: Pass the blue power checkpoint and reach the green power target area within the specified time.
TimeDestination01_A1.IntroduceContent:
Run, run, run! Orienteering not fun enough? Rankings got you down? Hone your skills with Speed training and strive to be number one!

Challenge Difficulty: Normal
1. Activate the next power ring checkpoint with the target power ring.
2. The blue power ring will give you a speed boost.
3. Activate the green power checkpoint and reach the finish line within the specified time.

WaterSkating01_A2.Description:
Goal: Use the Jetboard to reach the finish line to complete the training
Collect up to four red balls to get extra points
WaterSkating01_A2.IntroduceContent:
Challenge the limits of your speed on water, keep accelerating towards the finish line, and become a Jetboard Master.

Challenge Difficulty: Hard
1. Collect red balls for extra points.
2. Touch the blue boost pad to accelerate and keep gliding at high speed.
3. Reach the finish line within the specified time to complete the training.

Goal: Use the Jetboard to reach the finish line to complete the training

CrossLineA5_01.Description: Reach the finishing line within time limit without touching the rays

Hunting01_A2.IntroduceContent:
There are many traces of large beasts in Banges. Use your skills to quickly hunt all of your prey and become a real hunting expert.

Challenge Difficulty: Normal
1. Hunt in the training area.
2. Hunt the beasts and gain more points, and these points will be converted to rewards at the end.

TimeLimitClimb01_A4.Description: Goal: Collect 24 electro mushrooms along the way and make it to the end.
TimeLimitClimb01_A4.IntroduceContent:
How do you conquer a mountain? Climb it. How about the Tower of Fantasy? Climb it. A true mountaineering expert can quickly determine the critical point to not fall.

Challenge Difficulty: Hard *Mighty mushrooms can make the challenge easier.
1. Climb along the indicated route until you reach the end.
2. Gain points by collecting electro mushrooms along the way.
3. Green electric mushrooms provide extra endurance.

TimeLimitClimb02_A4.Description: Goal: Collect 29 electro mushrooms along the way and make it to the end.
TimeLimitClimb02_A4.IntroduceContent:

NoteACrash01_A4.Description: Goal: Hit the notes at the right time to get points
NoteACrash01_A4.IntroduceContent:
Crown has a special training facility that constantly produces various notes according to a rhythm. Use weapons to play it.

Challenge difficulty: Normal
1. Score points by hitting oncoming notes.
2. Missed notes will disappear after leaving the staff.
3. Hit right on the line for double points.

RollingBall01_A2.IntroduceContent:
Just roll the ball into the designated spot to complete the challenge! Seems simple, right? Maybe you need more patience, this challenge isn't easy at all.

Challenge Difficulty: Hard
1. Manipulate the panel to rotate it.
2. Control the angle of the panels to roll the gravity ball.
3. Role the ball to the destination to get a reward.

RollingBall01_A3.IntroduceContent:

CatchDoll01_A3.Description: Aim: Move the claw to grab items.
CatchDoll01_A3.IntroduceContent:
1. Operate the claw to grab items.
2. Send it to the safe area to get the item.
3. Catch different items to get different prizes.

Football01_A1.Description: Goal: Kick the ball into the goal 8 times.
Football01_A1.IntroduceContent:
A field built around Astra Omnium Tower, it was once the best place to find some entertainment at the shelter. Although it has since been abandoned, it isn't a bad spot to occasionally come and hone your skills.

Challenge Difficulty: Easy
1. Kick the ball into the goal to score points within a limited time.
2. The ball will regenerate after scoring a goal. The more goals scored, the higher the reward points.

TestRollingBall.IntroduceContent:
Just roll the ball into the designated spot to complete the challenge! Seems simple, right? Maybe you need more patience, this challenge isn't easy at all.

Challenge Difficulty: Hard
1. Manipulate the panel to rotate it.
2. Control the angle of the panels to roll the gravity ball.
3. Role the ball to the destination to get a reward.

SemirBoom.Description: Freeze the green pipe with the coolant launcher. The mission fails if you touch the red pipe.

ActivitySTG_01.Description:
Objective: Defeat Valkyrie
Avoid taking damage as much as possible

ActivityGliding_01.Description: Objective: Destroy the Heirs of Aida surveillance units to the greatest extent possible

ActivitySneak_01.Description: Objective: Annihilate all the Heirs of Aida guards without being detected

RollBall.Description: Goal: Throw the ball and hit the highlighted target 10 times

NoteACrash_VeraCity.Description: Goal: Hit the notes at the right time to get points

MoveArchery.Description: Objective: Attack the energy crystal using the correct element.

MoveShoot.Description: Objective: Use the weapon carried by the wings to shoot the energy crystal.

CarryBox.Description:
Objective: Move all boxes to designated spots
Rainbow platforms could help you transport the boxes, but could also hinder you.
